mapper.select: SELECT inf_systeminformation.SystemInformationId AS systemInformationId, inf_systeminformation.SystemInformationTitle AS systemInformationTitle, inf_systeminformation.SystemInformationContent AS systemInformationContent, inf_user_message.MessageSendDate AS sendDate FROM inf_systeminformation, inf_user_message WHERE inf_systeminformation.SystemInformationId = inf_user_message.SystemInformationId AND inf_user_message.BookType = '0' AND inf_user_message.UserId = #{userId} limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as systemInformationId
INSERT INTO inf_systeminformation (systemInformationId, systemInformationTitle, systemInformationContent, systemInformationPicture, systemInformationStatus) VALUES (#{systemInformationId}, #{systemInformationTitle}, #{systemInformationContent}, #{systemInformationPicture}, #{systemInformationStatus})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as messageId
INSERT INTO inf_user_message(messageId, systemInformationId, userId, messageType) VALUES (#{messageId}, #{infoNum}, #{userId}, #{messageType})
